title: Solving the Riddle
detail_text: <:th_ch0009/>You can't even solve this one, Kanan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>You haven't solved it either, have you, Nico-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Nico already has the answer inside my head! If you can't even solve something as easy as this, you won't be able to clear the escape room!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>This one is pretty hard, you know? Do you really know the answer?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Of course I do!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Then write it down. Right here. The answer.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>....T-, then it wouldn't be good practice for you, Kanan. Solve it by yourself. Nico already knew the answer unconditionally, though!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>How suspicious~. If you lie to your riddle-solving partner, I won't go to another riddle-solving game with you, got it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Okay, my bad. Nico can't solve it either.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>As long as you're honest! Alright, let's work together to solve it. If there are two of us, we'll be done in no time!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
